p: Non-linear curve fitting functions were applied on normalized dose-response cell viability data obtained from SRB and MTT assays, then IC 50 values were calculated using GraphPad Prism 5. All the experiments were performed in triplicate unless otherwise stated and results are expressed as mean Â± SD. One-way ANOVA was performed on data obtained of bar graphs using GraphPad Prism 5. Significance levels of p < 0.05 were considered for the rejection of the null hypothesis.
